title:
Stainless Steel Refrigerator Shovel Ice Scraper Removal Deicing Tool Kitchen;
stainless stell and PP material; colors: blue, gray, pink; size: 17x4.5 cm;
descriptions:
Introducing our Stainless Steel Refrigerator Shovel Ice Scraper Removal Deicing Tool for the kitchen! Made with high-quality stainless steel and PP material, this handy tool is perfect for cleaning ice and frost from your fridge. Its durable construction ensures it meets all your household requirements.

Available in three vibrant colors - blue, gray, and pink, this ice scraper is not only functional but also adds a pop of color to your kitchen. The compact size of 17x4.5 cm makes it easy to store and use whenever needed.

Each package includes 1 Fridge Ice Scraper, so you can start deicing right away. Please note that there may be a slight measurement deviation of 1-5mm and color variation due to monitor and lighting differences.

Make your kitchen tasks easier with our Stainless Steel Refrigerator Shovel Ice Scraper Removal Deicing Tool. Get yours today and say goodbye to frosty fridges!
